inclusion.criterion: increased serum amylase or lipase after ERCP
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: no mention of increased serum amylase or lipase after ERCP

inclusion.criterion: new or worsening abdominal pain compatible with pancreatitis after ERCP
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient experienced similar pain twice in the past year and current epigastric pain radiates to the right upper quadrant

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of abdominal perforation or bleeding

exclusion.criterion: severe acute pancreatitis with multi-organ failure
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: patient is mildly febrile and BP is 150/85, but no mention of multi-organ failure

exclusion.criterion: PEP has occurred and additional imaging tests and endoscopy are required
exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of history of chronic pancreatitis

notes: Patient has a history of hypercholesterolemia and 2 NVDs, but no other relevant medical history mentioned.
